TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InvalidCastException extends System.Exception
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InvalidCastException extends System.SystemException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InvalidCastException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 当执行了无效的强制转换或显式转换时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown for invalid casting or explicit conversion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 支持从派生类型到它们的基类型的自动转换并返回到派生的类型，以及向 interface 对象和背面提供接口的类型的自动转换。.NET Framework supports automatic conversion from derived types to their base types and back to the derived type, as well as from types that present interfaces to interface objects and back. 它还包括支持自定义转换的各种机制。It also includes a variety of mechanisms that support custom conversions. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的类型转换](/dotnet/standard/base-types/type-conversion)。For more information, see [Type Conversion in .NET Framework](/dotnet/standard/base-types/type-conversion). 不支持将一种类型的实例转换为另一种类型时，将引发异常。An exception is thrown when the conversion of an instance of one type to another type is not supported. 例如，如果尝试将值转换 为值， 则会引发 异常。For example, attempting to convert a value to a value throws an exception. 它与异常不同 ，后者是在支持一种类型到另一种类型的转换时引发的，但源类型的值超出了目标类型的范围。It differs from an exception, which is thrown when a conversion of one type to another is supported, but the value of the source type is outside the range of the target type. 异常是由开发人员错误引起的，不应在块中进行处理 `try/catch` 。An exception is caused by developer error and should not be handled in a `try/catch` block. 相反，应该消除异常的原因。Instead, the cause of the exception should be eliminated. 有关系统支持的转换的信息，请参见 类。For information about conversions supported by the system, see the class. 对于在目标类型可以存储源类型值但不能存储特定源值时所发生的错误，请参见 异常。For errors that occur when the destination type can store source type values but is not large enough to store a specific source value, see the exception. > [!NOTE] > 在许多情况下，语言编译器检测到源类型和目标类型之间不存在转换，并发出编译器错误。In many cases, your language compiler detects that no conversion exists between the source type and the target type and issues a compiler error. 以下部分介绍了尝试转换时引发异常的一些情况 ：Some of the conditions under which an attempted conversion throws an exception are discussed in the following sections: - [基元类型和 IConvertiblePrimitive types and IConvertible](#Primitive) - [ChangeType 方法The Convert.ChangeType method](#ChangeType) - [收缩转换和 IConvertible 实现Narrowing conversions and IConvertible implementations](#Narrowing) - [DowncastingDowncasting](#Downcasting) - [从接口对象转换Conversion from an interface object](#Interface) - [字符串转换String conversions](#String) - [Visual Basic 6.0 迁移Visual Basic 6.0 migration](#Migration) 为了使显式引用转换成功，源值必须为 `null` ，或者源参数引用的对象类型必须可通过隐式引用转换转换为目标类型。For an explicit reference conversion to be successful, the source value must be `null`, or the object type referenced by the source argument must be convertible to the destination type by an implicit reference conversion. 以下中间语言 (IL) 指令引发 异常：The following intermediate language (IL) instructions throw an exception: - `castclass` - `refanyval` - `unbox` 使用 HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDCAST，其值为0x80004002。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDCAST, which has the value 0x80004002. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## 基元类型和 IConvertiblePrimitive types and IConvertible 直接或间接调用不支持特定转换的基元类型的 实现。You directly or indirectly call a primitive type's implementation that does not support a particular conversion. 例如，尝试将 值转换为 或将值转换为时，将 引发 异常。For example, trying to convert a value to a or a value to an throws an exception. 下面的示例调用 和方法将 值转换为 。The following example calls both the and methods to convert a value to a . 在这两种情况下，方法调用都将引发 异常。In both cases, the method call throws an exception. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/iconvertible1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/vb/iconvertible1.vb" id="Snippet2"::: 由于转换不受支持，因此没有解决方法。Because the conversion is not supported, there is no workaround. ## ChangeType 方法The Convert.ChangeType method 您已调用 方法将对象从一种类型转换为另一种类型，但一个或两个类型不实现 接口。You've called the method to convert an object from one type to another, but one or both types don't implement the interface. 在大多数情况下，由于不支持转换，因此没有解决方法。In most cases, because the conversion is not supported, there is no workaround. 在某些情况下，一种可能的解决方法是将属性值从源类型手动分配给目标类型的类似属性。In some cases, a possible workaround is to manually assign property values from the source type to similar properties of a the target type. ## 收缩转换和 IConvertible 实现Narrowing conversions and IConvertible implementations 收缩运算符定义类型支持的显式转换。Narrowing operators define the explicit conversions supported by a type. C # 中的转换运算符或 `CType` Visual Basic (中的转换方法（如果 `Option Strict` 在执行转换时需要) 上的转换方法）。A casting operator in C# or the `CType` conversion method in Visual Basic (if `Option Strict` is on) is required to perform the conversion. 但是，如果源类型和目标类型都不定义两个类型之间的显式转换或收缩转换，并且 一个或两个类型的实现不支持从源类型到目标类型的转换，则 会引发异常。However, if neither the source type nor the target type defines an explicit or narrowing conversion between the two types, and the implementation of one or both types doesn't support a conversion from the source type to the target type, an exception is thrown. 在大多数情况下，由于不支持转换，因此没有解决方法。In most cases, because the conversion is not supported, there is no workaround. ## DowncastingDowncasting 你是 downcasting 的，也就是说，尝试将基类型的实例转换为它的派生类型之一。You are downcasting, that is, trying to convert an instance of a base type to one of its derived types. 在下面的示例中，尝试将 `Person` 对象转换为 `PersonWithID` 对象失败。In the following example, trying to convert a `Person` object to a `PersonWithID` object fails. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/basetoderived1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/vb/basetoderived1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 如示例所示，仅当 `Person` 对象是通过从对象到对象的向上转换创建的 `PersonWithId` `Person` ，或者 `Person` 对象为时 `null` ，才会成功。As the example shows, the downcast succeeds only if the `Person` object was created by an upcast from a `PersonWithId` object to a `Person` object, or if the `Person` object is `null`. ## 从接口对象转换Conversion from an interface object 您正在尝试将接口对象转换为实现该接口的类型，但目标类型不是同一类型，或者是该接口对象最初派生自的类型的基类。You are attempting to convert an interface object to a type that implements that interface, but the target type is not the same type or a base class of the type from which the interface object was originally derived. 下面的示例 在尝试将对象转换为对象时引发异常 。The following example throws an exception when it attempts to convert an object to a object. 转换失败是因为尽管 类实现了 接口，但对象与从中 派生接口对象的类无关。The conversion fails because although the class implements the interface, the object is not related to the class from which the interface object was derived. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/Interface1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.InvalidCastException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/vb/Interface1.vb#3)] 如异常消息所示，仅当接口对象转换回原始类型（在本例中为）的实例时，转换才会成功 。As the exception message indicates, the conversion would succeed only if the interface object is converted back to an instance of the original type, in this case a . 如果接口对象转换为原始类型的基类型的实例，则此转换也会成功。The conversion would also succeed if the interface object is converted to an instance of a base type of the original type. ## 字符串转换String conversions 尝试使用 c # 中的转换运算符将值或对象转换为其字符串表示形式。You are trying to convert a value or an object to its string representation by using a casting operator in C#. 在下面的示例中，将值强制转换 为字符串并尝试将整数转换为字符串的尝试会引发 异常。In the following example, both the attempt to cast a value to a string and the attempt to cast an integer to a string throw an exception. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/ToString1.cs#4)] > [!NOTE] > 使用 Visual Basic `CStr` 运算符可将基元类型的值转换为字符串。Using the Visual Basic `CStr` operator to convert a value of a primitive type to a string succeeds. 此操作不会引发 异常。The operation does not throw an exception. 若要成功将任何类型的实例转换为其字符串表示形式，请调用其 `ToString` 方法，如以下示例所示。To successfully convert an instance of any type to its string representation, call its `ToString` method, as the following example does. `ToString`方法始终存在，因为 方法由类定义， 因此由所有托管类型继承或重写。The `ToString` method is always present, since the method is defined by the class and therefore is either inherited or overridden by all managed types. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/ToString2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet5"::: ## Visual Basic 6.0 迁移Visual Basic 6.0 migration 使用用户控件中的自定义事件调用来升级 Visual Basic 6.0 应用程序以 Visual Basic .NET，并 引发异常，并出现消息 "指定的强制转换无效"。You're upgrading a Visual Basic 6.0 application with a call to a custom event in a user control to Visual Basic .NET, and an exception is thrown with the message, "Specified cast is not valid." 若要消除此异常，请将窗体中的代码行更改 (例如 `Form1`) To eliminate this exception, change the line of code in your form (such as `Form1`) ``` Call UserControl11_MyCustomEvent(UserControl11, New UserControl1.MyCustomEventEventArgs(5)) ``` 并将其替换为以下代码行：and replace it with the following line of code: ``` Call UserControl11_MyCustomEvent(UserControl11(0), New UserControl1.MyCustomEventEventArgs(5)) ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将 新实例的属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，例如 "无法从源类型强制转换为目标类型"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Cannot cast from source type to destination type." 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用参数初始化新异常的属性 `message` 。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间调用此构造函数以重新构造在流上传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization).

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不为 ，则当前异常将在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者， `null` 如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or returns `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, int32 errorCode) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, errorCode As Integer)

param.name: message
param.span: 指示所发生异常的原因的消息。

span.span: The message that indicates the reason the exception occurred.

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 与异常关联的错误代码 (HRESULT) 值。

span.span: The error code (HRESULT) value associated with the exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的消息和错误代码初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message and error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用参数初始化新异常的属性 `message` 。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 此构造函数提供一个 HRESULT 值，该类的继承者可以 通过类的 protected 属性访问该值 。This constructor supplies an HRESULT value that is accessible to inheritors of the class, via the protected property of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
